-- Drop view if it exists
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS GermanyView;
GO
-- Create view over all Parquet files in the folder
CREATE VIEW GermanyView AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://dlintech001.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/Bank_Churn/geography=France/date_of_processing=2025-12-05/',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS [result];
GO
